It is labor lost to teach people to look to God as a healer of their infirmities, unless they are taught 
                                                                           216
also to lay aside unhealthful practices. In order to receive His blessing in answer to prayer, they must cease to do evil and learn to do well. Their surroundings must be sanitary, their habits of life correct. They must live in harmony with the law of God, both natural and spiritual.
